description: The transaction failed permanently. The server will not try to send the message again.

responses.response: 551 5.7.1 Due to the very low reputation of the sending domain, this message has been blocked (Code 2).
responses.description: Your domain is on a reputation blacklist such as the Spamhaus DBL. You will need to be delisted before you can send emails.

responses.response: 551 5.7.1 Loop detected: Email is sent and forwarded from/to improvmx.com. (#id-5.9.0)
responses.description: The destination mailbox loops back to ImprovMX. They block these messages in order to avoid loops.
The domain was not found in the ImprovMX database.

responses.response: 551 5.7.1 Our database returned invalid pieces of information about the requested recipient’s domain (#id-5.9.3)
551 5.7.1 Unable to correctly read the forwarding recipient (where to forward the email to) (#id-5.9.5)
